name: ADD BANNER AF
author: Alessandro Filira - Web Agency Altramarca

sections.description:
This plug-in permitted you to put a widget in sidebar with image.
You can manage dimension, link and the tag Alt of image.
There are no problems with the oldest version of WordPress.

A few notes about the sections above:

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the directory add_banner_AF to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Aspect > Widget
  4. Use it

short_description: Permitted yout to add image with or without link in your sidebar, with a widget
